name: Road Rescue
desc: My FYP for sending alert to rider victims and ambulace when there is accident happens

name: Facial Recognition System
desc: An AI based facial recognition system that uses computer vision to recognize faces.

name: Traffic Sign Detection
desc: An AI based traffic signs detection system that uses computer vision and a model trained by YOLO 11

name: Chatbot
desc: A chatbot built by fine tuning Google Gemini model

name: Hand Gestures Recognition
desc: A real-time AI-based system that detects and classifies hand gestures using a webcam. Built using Python, OpenCV, and Mediapipe

name: Real-Time Object Detection
desc: A real-time object detection system using the YOLOv8 model. The system detects and labels multiple objects in video streams with high precision.

name: Skin Disease Detection
desc: Created a deep learning model using TensorFlow and Keras to classify skin diseases from image data.
